DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect 2.6 g/d phytosterol ingestion LDL cholesterol metabolism . It expect dose significantly reduce LDL cholesterol 12 week supplementation .
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine effect 2.6 g/d phytosterol ingestion LDL cholesterol metabolism . It expect dose significantly reduce LDL cholesterol 12 week supplementation . The study recruit 72 men woman 20-70 year age mild hypercholesteremia ( > 130 mg/dl LDL-C ) . They assign 1 2 group . Participants ingested supplement placebo 12 week , interim assessment 6 week . Participants agree maintain current diet , medication , exercise habit donate blood trial .
DOC.criteria: mild hypercholesteremia , sign informed consent , donate blood , maintain diet exercise habit BMI < 18.5 > 34.9 , recent blood donation , serious lifethreatening disease
